alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:58PM CDT until June 07 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Western Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1058 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Feterita, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Feterita around 1115 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
